mapper.select: select c.id car_id,CONCAT(b.`name`, c.series) car_name, COUNT(o.car_item_id) sales_volume, (CASE WHEN SUM(o.total_amount)>0 THEN SUM(o.total_amount) ELSE 0 END) AS sales_amount from tnc_brand b JOIN tnc_car c ON b.id = c.brand_id LEFT JOIN tnc_car_item ci ON c.id = ci.car_id LEFT JOIN tnc_order o ON o.car_item_id = ci.id AND (o.start_date >= #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND o.start_date <= #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY SUM(o.total_amount) DESC LIMIT #{x,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select c.id car_id,CONCAT(b.`name`, c.series) car_name, COUNT(o.car_item_id) sales_volume, (CASE WHEN SUM(o.total_amount)>0 THEN SUM(o.total_amount) ELSE 0 END) AS sales_amount from tnc_brand b JOIN tnc_car c ON b.id = c.brand_id LEFT JOIN tnc_car_item ci ON c.id = ci.car_id LEFT JOIN tnc_order o ON o.car_item_id = ci.id AND (o.start_date >= #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND o.start_date <= #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY COUNT(o.car_item_id) DESC LIMIT #{x,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(o.car_item_id) sales_volume,SUM(o.total_amount) sales_amount FROM tnc_order o WHERE TO_DAYS(o.start_date) = TO_DAYS(#{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
